cast.name: 艾尔玛·霍尔 Irma P. Hall

introduction: The Empty Chair is a story of friendship shared by three men and their journey of faith. The death of his first girlfriend makes Jake angry toward God. His disbelief further wells in his heart with the merciless killings he has witnessed in several of his Marine missions. An incident in Nigeria changes his life when a chaplain gives his own life to save him. Jake returns to the Chapain's home town thinking he has a debt to pay. His journey takes a twist when he finds himself in Pakistan after finding that his friend Cameron and his wife Lilly, who are on mission in India, are in danger; Jake does his best to save them, even if it means giving up his own life. Jake's journey for redemption takes him on an emotional ride and leads him to love and hope that he never expected to find. Empty Chair includes exciting and dramatic events that are based on true stories.
